message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $8500?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $9000. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
